item.description:
I started hearing a lot of good things about The Chicken Slacks last fall, but kept missing opportunities to see them for one reason or another. But finally this past Friday I was able to catch them at the Harpoon Summer Session, and found out that there was good reason for all the good things I had heard. They brought it all - soul, funk, rhythm and blues and a whole lot of groovin and shakin!

So for those that haven't seen them yet, or for those of you that just like to get down and get funky, let's
meetup at the Cantab Lounge in Central Square, Cambridge on July 2 and kick off the Fourth of July right with a funky groove! Especially since many of us will have Friday the 3rd off form work!

Notes:

Cover charge is $5.

As per my usual practice I will email my cell number to all Yes and Maybe RSVPs sometime the day of the event, likely by mid-day, so in case you can't find us, you won't get lost in the crowd.

Cambridge being what it is, parking is limited, but there are spaces on the street, and a few small lots around.
Better yet, if you take the T, the Central Square Red Line stop is just a block away.
item.name: The Chicken Slacks
